profile.camera_permission_denied: Access to the camera is blocked. Make sure Allow apps to access your camera is enabled.

manager.archive_floor_alert: Please note that all zones this floor may contain will be archived
manager.archive_building_alert: Please note that all floor and zones this building may contain will be archived

manager.restore_office_fail: To restore this office, you first need to restore its parent floor: {{name}}

manager.no_floor_map_offices_available: No floor plan provided, ask your office manager to add one in FlexTeam.
manager.on_boarding_not_done_tooltip: User onboarding not finished. Click to remind by email.
manager.unconfirmed_according: According to their default week, these users usually are in this floor that day. But they didn't confirm this information yet.
manager.book_meeting_warning: To book this meeting room, please connect to Flexteam with your Google/Microsoft account
manager.link_office_to: Link to external meeting room on Google or Microsoft
manager.link_office_to_message: The linkage must be done by an {{provider}} admin logged to Flexteam
manager.extenal_office_no_right_admin: You should be {{provider}} admin to be able to retrieve meeting rooms
manager.user_in_overflow_tooltip: "Overflow" option has been activiation by an admin for this floor, it means users are still registered to come to the office but couldn't book a desk. They will appear here. For more info, you can contact your admin or Flexteam
manager.archive_alert: Note: Any user that booked this space after this date will see their status set back to Undefined.
manager.all_desk_will_be_deleted: All desk on map will be deleted, do you confirm?
manager.confirmation_delete_seat:

note: the user will be notified and his status will be reverted to undefined

manager.timeslot_not_defined: You have to book location for {{timeslotText}}

onboarding.plan_your_day: Plan in 1 minute your days at the office according to the real presence of your colleagues

onboarding.with_flexteam_you_know: With FlexTeam you know when your colleagues are in office or not and you can decide where YOU want to work.
onboarding.lets_start: Let's start with your profile, it only takes a minute !
onboarding.define_your_template: These preferences will be applied by default in the app to facilitate your declarations
onboarding.as_default_week: by default in the app to facilitate your declarations

onboarding.you_will_see_their_presences: You will see their presences in priority
onboarding.change_later_in_your_profile: You'll be able to edit it
onboarding.thanks_your_account_is_ready: Thank you, your account is ready !
onboarding.connect_you: Login, find out who will be in the office, and plan your days !
onboarding.team_config_already_done: Team configuration has already been done !
onboarding.favorite_config_already_done: Favorite team configuration has already been done !

onboarding.invitation_email_sent: Invitation email has been successfully sent

DeleteSeat.title: Your reservation has been deleted
DeleteSeat.content: {{deskName}} you booked for the {{date}} has been deleted by an admin, please book again.

PercentTeam.title: {{percent}}% of team {{teamName}} will be in office on {{date}}
PercentTeam.content: You are not in office, do you want to join them ?

DayLeft.title: [{{teamName}}] {{noticePeriod}} days left to declare next week location
DayLeft.content: Share your presence with your teammates now

RemoveTeamMember.title: You are no longer part of team {{teamName}}
RemoveTeamMember.content: You've been removed to team {{teamName}} by {{managerName}}

AddTeamMember.title: You are now part of team {{teamName}}
AddTeamMember.content: Congratulation! You've been added to team {{teamName}} by {{managerName}}

StatusChangedByManager.title: Your status has been changed!
StatusChangedByManager.content: Your manager {{manager}} set you to {{address}} for {{dateTarget}}

MaxPlaceAvailableInLocation.title: {{office}} is full on the {{dateTargetFull}}
MaxPlaceAvailableInLocation.content: The maximum capacity of {{maxPlaceAvailable}} person has been exceeded for the office {{office}} for the {{dateTarget}}, {{countPersonInLocation}} employees are set to come that day

RemoveUserFromPresenceList.title: An user has been removed from presence list
RemoveUserFromPresenceList.content: Your {{teamName}} team member {{userName}} has been removed from the {{dateTarget}} presence list by {{byUsername}}

RemoveTeam.title: A team has been removed
RemoveTeam.content: Team {{teamName}} has been removed by its owner {{managerName}}

limit_booking.title: Your organization admin doesn't allow the booking more than {{limitValue}} weeks in advance, contact him for more information
limit_booking.content: Your organization admin doesn't allow the booking more than {{limitValue}} weeks in advance, contact him for more information

ArchivedBookingOfUser.title: Your status has been changed!
ArchivedBookingOfUser.content: The zone {{spaceName}} you booked for the {{bookingDate}} has been archived starting the {{archiveDate}}, you'll be automatically reverted to an undefined status after this day if you haven't changed it

UpdateWorkingPolicyThatIsConflict.title: Your remote profile "{{policyName}}" has been modified!
UpdateWorkingPolicyThatIsConflict.content: Your default week may have been impacted (status reverted back to "not defined") and/or some of your booking for the next weeks may have been deleted. You can check and change them now.

ApplyWorkingPolicyThatIsConflictForUser.title: A remote profile "{{policyName}}" has been applied to you!
ApplyWorkingPolicyThatIsConflictForUser.content: Your default week may have been impacted (status reverted to "not defined") and/or some of your booking for the next weeks may have been deleted. You can check and change them now.

MemberBookedExceptionalBookingOutsideRem.title: Your team member has made an exceptional booking outside of his remote profile "{{profileName}}"

ManagerHasSetMandatoryOfficeDays.title: Your team "{{teamName}}" rules has been updated
ManagerHasSetMandatoryOfficeDays.content: Your manager {{managerName}} has set {{mandatoryOfficeDays}} as mandatory office days for your team {{teamName}}

FreeDeskByManager.title: A desk has been removed
FreeDeskByManager.content: Your manager {{managerName}} has removed the desk that you booked for {{dateTarget}}

organization.limitRemoteDaysPerWeek: Maximum remote days allowed per week
organization.limitRemoteDaysPerMonth: Maximum remote days allowed per month

organization.import_microsoft_directory_tooltip: You must sign in with Microsoft account to use this feature
organization.manager_validate_in_case_exception: Team Manager will be informed in case of override
organization.limit_booking_description: With this option, choose the timeframe in which the calendar is open for your users. They will not be able to book past this limit. Example : choosing 3 weeks allows the booking only for the next 3 weeks
organization.remote_work: This is a remote working status
organization.public_domain_not_allowed: You can not add public domain.
organization.allow_office_over_booking_tooltip: This option allows user to book an office even when full, they will appear in overflow
organization.show_answer_to_everyone: Display answer for everyone to see
organization.xls_import_note: Please use the file automatically downloaded as a template. FlexTeam will take the information listed to create the users and teams. note that duplicates or already added users will be ignored. you'll be able to edit the users in the directory afterward
organization.manager_does_not_exist: The manager email you listed does not exists
organization.user_as_manager: User that is marked as their own managers
organization.manager_doesnt_have_team: User that is manager of someone but doesn't have a team
organization.flexteam_admin_is_going_to_contact: A Flexteam Admin is going to contact you to help you changing this parameter.
organization.changing_working_policy_confirmation:
This policy is applied to several users.
If the changes you made are not compatible with their default week, some of their statuses will be reverted to Not defined. And if some bookings in their schedule are not compatible anymore, they will be deleted. In any case, they will receive a notification
organization.use_cant_change_email: You can't change the user email as a user is already existing with the same email
organization.email_change_confirmation_message: Editing the email address automatically send an email to reset the password

setting.owner_desc_placeholder: You can write information here for our team to see
setting.hierarchy_tooltip: The main team that you manage, you can own only one (sales, ops, Tech, etc)
setting.hierarchy_exists_tooltip: You can own only one Team, delete "{{teamName}}" to create a new one
setting.social_tooltip: For social groups (tennis, running, chess, etc), you can create as many as you want and delete them when you want
setting.work_tooltip: For work groups, meant to be temporary (Special Projects, Cross-team initiatives, etc), you can create as many as you want
setting.confirm_remove_team_note: Note : group members will be removed from the group
setting.favorite_team_description_default: This groups is only visible by you and you only. Users will not know if they are part of the group, added or removed
setting.do_you_want_to_dismiss_user_from_team: Do you really want to dismiss {{username}} from {{teamName}}
setting.mandatory_offices_days_tooltip: For the selected days, the team members won't be able to work remotely, their status will be reverted to "undefined" if they don't fit the change. They will also receive a notification

directory.office_manager_tooltip: Access the office page. Can edit the office organization, structure, and rules
directory.team_manager_tooltip: Can create and own a Hierarchical team and have certain right on its teams members : change their satus, Work Profile, etc
directory.stat_manager_tooltip: Access the Statistics page and can export the data on office usage and work habits
directory.organization_manager_tooltip: Access the Organization page and can edit Company wide settings : work profile, Statuses, integration to external tools, etc
directory.rh_manager_tooltip: Access the directory page and can invite/archive users in FlexTeam. Can also edit personal information (teams, work profile, etc)
directory.archive_user_confirmation:
Are you sure you want to archive {{email}}? You can still restore them later in the archived user tab.

user_profile.next_matching_days: Next matching days in office with
user_profile.favorites_colleages_description: Add here the persons you want and easily access their schedule in the bar search with "My favorites"
user_profile.default_week_description: Filling this week will simplify your weekly declaration by prefilling the planning for you, if you don't change your planning during the week, it will be automatically validated on Friday night

message_error.RULE_LIMIT_OFFICE_DAYS_PER_WEEK_FAILED: You reached the limit office days per week
message_error.RULE_LIMIT_REMOTE_DAYS_PER_WEEK_FAILED: You reached the limit remote days per week
message_error.RULE_LIMIT_REMOTE_DAYS_PER_MONTH_FAILED: You reached the limit remote days per month
message_error.RULE_MANDATORY_OFFICE_DAYS_FAILED: Your hierarchical teams request a mandatory presence.
message_error.RULE_BLOCKED_USERS_OCCUPATION: The accessibility rules prevent you from booking in this office today, contact your office manager for more information.
message_error.RULE_RESERVED_USERS_OCCUPATION: The accessibility rules prevent you from booking in this office today, contact your office manager for more information.

message_warning_booking_location.changing_working_policy_not_compatible_d: Your remote profile {{policyName}} has been modified. Your default week may have been impacted (status reverted back to Not defined) and/or some of your booking for the next weeks may have been deleted. You can check and change them now.

This user future bookings or his default week are not compatible with the new policy. If you confirm the change, a notification will be sent to the user and some of his bookings will be set back to undefined or deleted to comply to the new policy.
message_warning_booking_location.booking_not_compatible_working_policy_wi: This booking is not allowed by your remote profile {{policyName}}. As exceptions are allowed for this profile, you can confirm the booking anyway, and a notification will be sent to {{managerName}} for information.
message_warning_booking_location.booking_not_compatible_working_policy_bo: This booking doesn't fit the rule of work profile {{policyName}} of this user, do you wish to confirm ?
This booking doesn't fit the rule of your work profile {{policyName}}, do you wish to confirm ?
message_warning_booking_location.booking_not_compatible_team_booked_by_ma: This booking doesn't fit the rule of team {{teamName}} of this user, do you wish to confirm ?
This booking doesn't fit the rule of your team {{teamName}}, do you wish to confirm ?
message_warning_booking_location.booking_not_compatible_working_policy_wa: This booking is not allowed by your remote profile {{policyName}}.
message_warning_booking_location.booking_not_compatible_mandatory_office_: {{dayName}} is a mandatory office day for your team {{teamName}}, click to confirm your choice and notify your manager
{{dayName}} is a mandatory office day for your team {{teamName}}.
